articles.description: European diplomat says his colleagues would prefer to have shots being given in their home country.
articles.title: China offers Covid-19 vaccine to foreign diplomats – but will they take it? - South China Morning Post

articles.content:
A shipment of Russia's Sputnik V COVID-19 vaccine arrives at Kosice Airport, in Slovakia, on March 1, 2021. 
Frantisek Ivan/The Associated Press
Under pressure to boost vaccine supplies in the EU, … [+4470 chars]
articles.description: Several countries have broken ranks with the EU in recent days as shortages continue, and Italy has banned the export of AstraZeneca doses
articles.title: Europe starts review of Russia's Sputnik V COVID-19 vaccine to try to overcome shortages as new variants appear - The Globe and Mail
